title: Open Tues 6:25-6:45pm,Pkg Avail,Shared Laundry(230 Wayne Ave #402)
posting_body: Contemporary Cleveland Heights fourth floor 1BR/1BA penthouse.
Floors are hardwood except in bath, lights are inset.
Large living room has deck at one end, inset kitchen on the other, next to the entrance.
Deck is the width of the apartment--both living room and bedroom have access to it.
It has a good view of Lake Merritt and the area.
C-shaped kitchen includes stainless electric stove, microwave and dishwasher.
Bedroom is located off the living room.
It has a closet with sliding mirror doors.
Standard bath has shower-over-tub with sliding glass doors.
Building is located on the east side of Lake Merritt, near Pine Knoll Park.
The fourth floor is only accessible via the elevator with a key; doors to stairs are locked on the fourth floor.
Building has a shared laundry room and parking is available for an additional fee.
It is four-five blocks to shopping and dining on East 18th Street.
Tenant pays a one-time broker's fee.
Leasing and Real Estate: Our Family Business for Over 100 Years.
